content: That's really helpful! I think I need to work on setting a budget and sticking to it, as well as implementing the 30-day rule. I've also been trying to avoid impulse buys on social media, and I've been doing a good job of that so far. I've unfollowed a lot of brands and retailers on Instagram, and I've been limiting my time on the app. It's helped me reduce my temptation to buy things on a whim, and I feel like I've been making more intentional purchasing decisions as a result.
